title: Haunting Images
description: Using DNA testing and a photographer's diary, a retired detective reopens an unsolved murder case in this Dateline classic reported by Keith Morrison. Originally aired on NBC on March 4, 2011.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
